description: Defines attachment points (sockets) on a body part where other parts can connect

sockets.description: List of socket definitions for this body part

id.description: Unique identifier for this socket within the parent part

orientation.description: Spatial orientation of this socket (supports composite orientations like 'left_front')

allowedTypes.description: Whitelist of part types that can attach to this socket

nameTpl.description: Template for auto-naming attached parts. Supports {{orientation}}, {{type}}, {{index}}, {{parent.name}}
